item.title: Delivering High-Velocity Docs that Keep Pace with Rapid Release Cycles
item.description:
Description

To prevent stale content and achieve a high standard of alignment with products, documentation must be a required component of the release cycle. At Pantheon, this means delivering each component with similar precision and trust. Documentation workflows must evolve to stay instep with agile and automated product pipelines.

In addition to sharing lessons learned, this talk will explore Pantheonâ€™s strategy for delivering high-velocity docs:

  • Increase project visibility
  • Simplify peer reviews
  • Make bots do the scutwork
  • Write more docs
item.dc:creator: Rachel Whitton

item.title: Monday Lightning Talks (Write The Docs NA 2016)
item.description:
Description

http://lanyrd.com/2016/writethedocs/sfbzwc/

  • 0:09:54 Matt Ness - Cats are Fun
  • 0:15:25 Rachel Whitton - Pantheon: Continuous Delivery Demo
  • 0:20:21 Colin Torretta - Managing Wikis
  • 0:26:37 Mo Nishiyama - Notes of Yesterday
item.dc:creator: Jon Manning
